junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> hello group,
> 
> When i was unit testing my SAX parser implementation to parse my xml
> file, i faced one problem. i want to test the
> startElement(...) method
> of the parser.I used some global variables in that and it returns
> nothing. how to test such methods using junit. pls inform me ASAP.

I don't understand the problem. Could you please elaborate?

As an aside, common practice is to not test methods, but behaviour.

Cheers, Ilja
